verses.text: This is My will, My one command, That love should dwell among you all. This is My will, that you should love by Me; As I have shown that I love you.
No greater love a man can have Than that he die to save his friends. You are My friends if you obey what I command; that you should do.
You chose not Me, but I chose you That you should go and bear much fruit. I chose you out that you in Me, should bear much fruit in each, in all.
All that I ask, My Father, For My name's sake you shall receive. This is My will, My one command, That love should dwell that will abide.
